item.title: The Witherer - Neutral Killer [Class Idea]
item.dc:creator: TheVideoChipmunk
item.description:
The Witherer

Neutral Killer

Passive (The Trial) - Death immune. If you are hit by your own virus from Plant Virus, you will gain an extra charge of Degenerate.

Passive (Foresee) - If occupation or redirection is attempted when using Degenerate, the occupier/redirector will be killed, the ability will be canceled, and you will lose a charge of the ability.

Day Ability (Plant Virus) - Plant a virus in a player. They will die in 3 nights, if they visit a player, that player will get the virus and the original holder will lose it. (If the player can visit two players one of the two at random will get the virus). This cannot be healed but the virus’ killing is postponed one more night if the target is jailed on the third night. The virus bypasses death immunity. 2 uses.

Day Ability (Trollbox) - Force a player to say something to the court. The target will not see the message. Infinite uses.

Night Ability (Corrupt) - Attack a player. Infinite uses.

Night Ability (Degenerate) - Attack one player tonight and give another the virus. 0 starting uses, uses may be gained from Plant Virus using the passive The Trial.

Win Condition: Same as all NK’s.
